ygData.subject: Re: Skull staff quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Danek, you attacked him? lol.. also congrats on the leveling.. last time I seen you, you were at level 38.. you wanted the staff that bad? =) Trilin Mithaniel
ygData.messageBody:
Danek, you attacked him? lol.. also congrats on the leveling.. last time I seen
you, you were at level 38.. you wanted the staff that bad? =)

Trilin
Mithaniel Marr

Vince Montana wrote:

> From: "Vince Montana" <montana@...>
>
> I forgot to mention, if you really want the priests staff you might need a
> few groups.
> he casts for 347. I hit him for 600 and it didn't even put a dent in his hp.
> :)
>
> Danek HealFast
> lvl 42 druid mith marr
> Leader of the blackmoon guild
>
> ----- Original Message -----
